strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Create your own Halloween Pumpkin for your desktop
strings.GADGET_ABOUT_TEXT:
Halloween Pumpkin © 2007 Benjamin Schirmer Create your own Halloween Pumpkin for your desktop.
